name: Cliffhanger (itch) (Lamamour, plopy86)
description:
In Cliffhanger, you control a charater standing on a platform composed of cubes. Your opponent (a second player or an AI) will try to make you fall in the lava below.

To defeat your opponent, you will have to absorb the cubes from your platform in order to load your weapon. The lower you go, the bigger your projectile will be. But be careful !!! The more cubes you absorb, the smaller your platform !

If you manage to touch your opponent, some of his platform cubes will be destroyed, leading him deeper and deeper until he falls into the lava !

Changelog:

  • 04/28/2021: Set the bullet colors the same as the laser -> more consistency
